seo.title: Cinque Terre Agriturismi 2025 | Farm Stays & Rural Accommodation
seo.description: Discover authentic agriturismi near Cinque Terre. Farm stays with local food, wine, olive oil, and traditional Ligurian countryside experiences.

body.title: Agriturismi near Cinque Terre
body.subtitle: Authentic farm stays in the Ligurian countryside with homemade food, local wines, olive groves, and peaceful rural settings

features.title: Authentic Rural Life
features.description: Experience traditional Ligurian agriculture with olive groves, vineyards, and vegetable gardens in the hills above Cinque Terre

features.title: Farm-to-Table Dining
features.description: Enjoy homemade meals with ingredients from the property: fresh vegetables, olive oil, wine, cheese, and preserves

features.title: Wine & Oil Tastings
features.description: Sample estate-produced wines and extra virgin olive oil, often with tours of production facilities

features.title: Peaceful Countryside
features.description: Escape tourist crowds in tranquil hilltop settings with panoramic views of the coast and Mediterranean

features.title: Better for Drivers
features.description: Easier parking and car access compared to villages, ideal base for exploring wider Liguria region

features.title: Family-Friendly
features.description: Spacious rooms, outdoor areas, animals, and authentic experiences perfect for families with children

body.title: Compare Accommodation Options
body.description: Explore hotels, apartments, camping, and other stays in and around Cinque Terre
